data.text_idea: Automate the process of sending emails
data.text_description: You can have a list of email addresses and their respective names. Then you can modify the message and send emails to the target audience automatically.
data.emails_to_nothing_1: You can add email addresses by clicking
data.subject: Write a subject of the email
data.email_template: Write a template of the email
data.email_template_to_nothing_1: You can add templates of emails by clicking
data.email_to_and_template_to_nothing: You can send emails if you add email addresses and templates of emails.
data.registration_noghing: To use the project "Sending Emails" of website you need to sign up or log in.
data.info_technology: This page was written using XML as page data store
